vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀβιούδ, ὁ, indecl. (Heb. אֲבִיָּהוּד),
Abiud, Abihud: Mat.1:13.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Mat.1.13;
son of: Zerubbabel (H2216);
father of: Eliakim (G1662);
brother of: Meshullam (H4918H), Hananiah (H2608L), Shelomith (H8019I), Hashubah (H2807), Ohel (H0169), Berechiah (H1296), Hasadiah (H2619), Jushab-hesed (H3142)
§ Abiud, "[my] father has majesty"
Abihud, (Proper name)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比玉 这个專有人名在希伯來文的意思是 "我父是尊榮的"
耶穌家譜中所羅巴伯的後代
(在#代上8:3|是便雅憫家的一員)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚比玉这个专有人名在希伯来文的意思是"我父是尊荣的"
耶稣家谱中所罗巴伯的后代
(在#代上8:3|是便雅悯家的一员)
